dc:title: Day After Day - January 1942
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Laments the country at war. Describes the hectic Christmas period, the many gifts, the ongoing work of hospitality, the illnesses of workers, her travels, and reading for the month. Asks forgiveness for not getting all the letters written.
